thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 7 of 68
thread.title: Mikayla Rodgers

author: Mikayla Rodgers
title: Mikayla Rodgers
text: I must say at first I was none too please with Gamecheap, but now I must admit they are very efficient. I ordered two video games and MS Office and I was delivered my activation codes within a minutes time. The prices are great and I will surely do business with them again. Oh and another point the Vice President is very good at making sure his customers are well taken care of. He will reach out to you personally and assure that you are a happy customer!!
